title: India won’t directly intervene in Lanka’s sovereign affairs: Khurshid
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana NEW DELHI: External affairs minister Salman Khurshid on Tuesday said in the Rajya Sabha that India would not intervene directly in Sri Lanka’s sovereign affairs even though MPs belonging AIADMK, DMK and CPI demanded that the government support the hard line taken by the US against the island country for the…
